summary: A Simple Real Pinus Canariensis Base Texture
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:

\"Real Pinus Canariensis Base Texture\" in Spanish (Canary Islands) is \"pinocha\", in english \"pine needle\", where I life is the base texture of the pines. A sample of this can be found on \"Clash of the Titans\" (2010) and \"Wrath of the Titans\" (2012), this movies was filmed here.


COMPLEMENTARY MODS:

1.- Skyrim Flora Overhaul

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141

2.- Serious HD Retexture Skyrim

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2146

3.- Skyrim HD - 2K Textures 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607

4.- TreesHD Skyrim Variation 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3812

5.- Dense Grass 100 Density

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28427

6.- Lush Grass

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3288

7.- Lush Trees

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3385

8.- Saltr ENB

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28499

9.- Green Grass for ENB

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28950


INSTALL:

Download using the nexus mod manager or download manually and unzip file, than merge the data folder with the data folder on your computer found in \"Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim\".


Thanks to:
All supporters, Bethesda & SkyrimNexus.
author: emd
